metadata.title: Crawford STL10 Duramount Flip Up Closed Loop Hook, 10-1/2" H x 8" W x 4-1/4" D
features: Universal design keeps hoses, cords & ropes in place
Holds folding lawn chairs, step stools & Ladders
Folds flat, safe working load is 50 lbs. on duramount rail,
Solid wall surface based on anchoring stud, 35 lb. on slat wall
description: Duramount, flip-up closed loop Hanger, universal design keeps hoses, cords & ropes in place, holds folding lawn chairs, step stools & ladders, folds flat, safe working load is 50 lbs. on duramount rail, solid wall surface based on anchoring stud, 35 lb. on slat wall.

Crawford DuraMount closed loop hook, capable of supporting up to 50-Pounds, and folds upward when not in use. Made of rugged powder coated steel with a soft vinyl coating to protect valuable tools and equipment. Three mounting options include screw-in, slatwall, or DuraMount rail for maximum strength and versatility. Crawford offers a full line of storage and organization products for a wide range of applications, uses, and capabilities, allowing full utilization of space efficiently and safely.
